# CMGyroData

**Class**

A single measurement of the device’s rotation rate.

## Declaration

```swift
class CMGyroData
```

## Overview

An application receives or samples `CMGyroData` objects at regular intervals after calling the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMotionManager/startGyroUpdates(to:withHandler:)] method or the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMotionManager/startGyroUpdates()] method of the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMMotionManager] class.

## Getting the Rotation Rate

- **rotationRate**: The rotation rate as measured by the device’s gyroscope.
- **CMRotationRate**: The type of structures representing a measurement of rotation rate.
- **CMRotationRateData**: A data object that contains a single rotation-rate measurement.
- **CMRecordedRotationRateData**: A data object that contains a single rotation-rate measurement at a specific time.

## Gyroscopes

- **Getting raw gyroscope events**: Retrieve data from the onboard gyroscopes.

## Inherits From

- CMLogItem

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
